author: meowbroski
content: Hi, i would like to implement a consensus algorithm, although only the "algorithm" itself. I would like to implement **Proof of History**

author: meowbroski
content: to clarify, with "algorithm" i mean just the logics behinde it without actually setting up a server or anything. You know how we write Merge sort and such
